Package managers

Class ColectionManager

java.lang.Object
managers.ColectionManager
public class ColectionManager extends Object
Manages a collection of Route objects, providing methods to add, update, remove, save, and retrieve routes by their ID.

The class also keeps track of initialization, update, and save times.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColectionManager

      public ColectionManager(RouteXMLScaner scaner, RouteXMLWriter writer)
      Constructs a ColectionManager by reading data via the given scanner. Initializes the collection and sets lastInitTime to the current time.
      Parameters:
      scaner - the XML scanner to read initial data from
      writer - the XML writer to save data

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all routes from the collection.

    • update

      public void update()
      Sorts the routes, updates lastUpdateTime to the current time, and initializes lastInitTime if it was null.

    • saveRoutes

      public void saveRoutes() throws IOException
      Saves the routes to an external file using RouteXMLWriter.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while saving
